Replace.Text: Pax Sinica
During a Golden Age, China receive additional +20% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_PEACE] Faith output in all cities and +20% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation nationwide.

Row.Text: The mighty Chinese empire is now in [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pax Sinica[ENDCOLOR]! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every tile in your empire that produces at least 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold produces 1 extra. +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People Earning Rate empire-wide.

Replace.Text: Each Scientist +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, Engineer +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, Merchant +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, Writer, Artist and Musician +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Great Russian Soul

The first 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in your cities don't generate [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness. +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +2 [ICON_RES_CONSUMER] Consumer Goods for all cities. All Units +15% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus while fighting within their own territory.
1 Level up for all Lv2 -Lv5 cities (England only has Lv1-Lv4 cities). All Units +15% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus while fighting outside their own territory.
+3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for all cities and it never expires. +1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output for all Great Works.
Kritik der reinen Vernunft

Every 50 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production output in a city offer additional +10 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +10 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output. The bonus are added to the base outputs of your cities so they can be multiplied by buildings, policies, etc.
+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for all cities and it never expires. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards any buildings in all cities.
The Gift from the Nile

+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold in every tile next to a river and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Flood Plains tiles worked by your city. +2 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower per city. +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Wonder construction.
+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Pasture. +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement for all Mounted Units, Tank Units, Land Hit-and-run Units and Helicopter Units.
Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged. Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture when you build a Military Unit (100% of its [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength).

[ICON_BULLET]-50% experience needed to earn their next promotion for all units. All cities receive a free Ikanda. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unit maintenance is reduced by 15% and gain +33% attack and defence when fighting a technologically superior enemy in friendly territory.

Land Melee units and Naval Melee units pay no Movement [ICON_MOVES] to pillage and pillage Gold equal to 200% of the damage inflicted on a city. Receive triple [ICON_GOLD] Gold from barbarian encampments or pillaging cities. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output for every Fishing Net, Workboats and Offshore Platform.

When a city is conquered by force, gain a free Technology discovered by its owner (one Technology per enemy city). If there are at least 5 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens left in the city after capturing, +1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

City-State [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence degrades at half and recovers at twice the normal rate. Gain 3 more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence (at Standard speed) per turn with City-States you could demand tribute from.

Defeated Barbarian unit in encampments will join you. Receive [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_PEACE] Faith after destroying a city (amount = 10*turn, 1,000 maximum). Borrow City names from other in-game Civs.
Pax Ottomana
+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Quarry, Fishing Net. +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Strategic Resources. +25% speed for worker's Tile Improvement construction rate.

+2 Gold [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for each Trade Route with a different civ or City-State. +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each Trade Route sent to Morocco. All Land Units receive a [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus (+20%) when fighting in Desert Tiles.
Only lose 2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from a Luxury Resource if your last copy of it is traded away. All cities receive a free Market.
+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Specialists. +4 [ICON_GOLD] Base Gold for every Sea International Trade Route and +25% Range for Cargoships.
Resource diversity grants twice as much [ICON_GOLD] Gold for Portugal in Trade Routes. All coastal Cities receive a free Harbor.

Cannot gain settlers nor annex cities. May purchase in puppet cities and puppet cities offers full [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output and [ICON_FOOD] Food Growth. Double the normal number of Trade Routes and [ICON_TOURISM] Theming Bonus in [ICON_CAPITAL] Captal. A Merchant of Venice appears after researching Optics.

The first 3 cities founded on continents other than where Indonesia started each provide 2 unique Luxury Resources. These 3 cities are free from Corruption and Public Security problems, cost No [ICON_GOLD] Gold maintance and can never be razed.
Founded cities start with additional territory (6 tiles). All cities receive a free Granary.
Can embark and move over Oceans immediately. Lv 4 and Lv 5 Cities are treated as Lv 3 Cities. +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus if within 2 tiles of a Moai.
Gains [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire from each enemy unit killed (50% of their [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength).
Rivers and adjacent difficult terrain count as clear terrain for [ICON_MOVES] Movement. Rivers extend length of land trade routes as if they were roads.+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every Trading Post.
+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for all Specialists. All Units receive a [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus (+25%) when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than Ethiopia.
-20% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from number of [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens.
Choose one more Belief than normal when you found a Religion. A Great Prophet appears after researching Writing.

+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith per city with an adjacent unimproved Forest. Bonus increases to +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith in Cities with 3 or more adjacent unimproved Forest tiles. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Camp.

Can spend [ICON_GOLD] Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for 5 turns(starting from around 500 [ICON_GOLD] Gold in the Ancient Era and the price will rise when Austria entering a new era). A Great Musician appears after researching Acoustics.
[ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and [ICON_PEACE] Faith from friendly City-States increased by 50%. +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for all Specialists.
+50% Range for Caravans. +300% for the efficiency of your trade routes spread the home city's religion. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from every Oasis.

[ICON_BULLET]Gain 500 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with a Great Person gift to a City-State. When declaring friendship, Sweden and their friend gain a +15% boost to [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The spirit of Swedish innovation grants 33% more [ICON_RESEARCH] Great Scientists.
+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for all Specialists. +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for all Great Person tile improvements.

After researching Theology, receive a [ICON_RESEARCH] Science boost each time a scientific building/Wonder is built in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. Also receive a bonus Great Person at the end of every Maya Long Count calendar cycle (every 394 years) (Each bonus person can only be chosen once)

Units move through Forest and Jungle in friendly territory as if they were Roads. These tiles can also be used to establish [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections and speed up Caravans. All Land Units receive a [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Bonus (+20%) when fighting in Forest Tiles.

Row.Text: Brazilian Soccer Player can only be created by building the Brazilian Football Pitch. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Brazilian Soccer Player can enter other nations' territory without an Open Border Agreement to generate one-time [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost like Great Musicians. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]All other nations will also receive the same amount of [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost generated by the Brazilian Soccer Player.

Association Football is the most popular sport in Brazil. The Brazilian national football team has won the FIFA World Cup tournament a record five times, in 1958, 1962, 1970, 1994 and 2002, and is the only team to succeed in qualifying for every World Cup competition ever held. It is among the favorites to win the trophy every time the competition is scheduled. After Brazil won its 3rd World Cup in 1970, they were awarded the Jules Rimet Trophy permanently. But 365 days before World Cup 2014 began, Brazil's rank dropped to 22nd, an all-time-low position.

Islamic Prophet is the unique prophet unit for Arabia. He can found or enhance a religion, construct the special Holy Site improvement and spread religion 4 times as the normal prophet unit. He can also conduct a trade mission in a City-State as the Great Merchant.

Prophets in Islam include "messengers", bringers of a divine revelation via an angel; and "prophets", lawbringers that Muslims believe were sent by God to every people, bringing God's message in a language they can understand. Belief in Islamic prophets is one of the six articles of the Islamic faith, and specifically mentioned in the Quran.
